Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Speaker at Research seminars as in the attached file.

Until now, supervisor of 2 Bachelor Theses in Financial Mathematics at the Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich, and of 5 Master Theses in Financial Mathematics at the University of Bielefeld. I have also co-supervised 12 Bachelor Theses in ActuarialMathematics at the Department of Mathematics of the University of Cologne.
Member of two appointment committees for a Full Professorship and an Associate Professorship in applied mathematics, University of Cologne, Germany
Member of the examination board of a Ph.D. exam, University of Cologne
Scientific collaboration with Julia Eisenberg (University of Liverpool, UK) on "Optimal reinsurance under regime switching in a Brownian risk model" (work in progress)
Reviewer for the scientific journals Energy Economics, Journal of Commodity Markets, Financial Markets and Portfolio Management
Scientific collaboration with Viviana Fanelli (University of Bari) resulted in the working paper "The Seasonality in the Implied Volatility of Electricity Options" (attached).

Scientific collaboration with Tiziano Vargiolu and Marco Piccirilli (University of Padova) on "An empirical study of no-arbitrage issues of electricity options in an additive pure-jump Lévy setting" (work in progress)

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Speaker at Conferences as in the attached file.

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Investigator in the Project Project "C5: Financial equilibria under Knightian uncertainty" within the Collaborative Research Center SFB 1283 (Taming uncertainty and profiting from randomness and low regularity in analysis, stochastics and their applications ), Bielefeld University, Germany. This collaborative research center has been funded by the German research Fundation (DFG) and it has a duration of 4 + 4 + 4 years (see https://www.sfb1283.uni-bielefeld.de/ for details).

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: DGVFM (Deutsche Gesellschaft für Versicherungs- und Finanzmathematik) travel grant for the 2nd European Actuarial Journal (EAJ) Conference in Vienna, Austria
DGVFM (Deutsche Gesellschaft für Versicherungs- und Finanzmathematik) travel grant for the 21st International Congress on Insurance: Mathematics and Economics (IME), Austria

Winner of the Research Prize YITP (Young Investigator Training Program) awarded at the Conference Energy Finance Italia 2018 held in Pescara (Italy). This prize financed a 1-month visit at the Department of Mathematoics of the University of Padova in March 2018.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Ph.D student in the Centre for Mathematics and Applications (CMA), University of Oslo, Norway. Interdisciplinary research center. Contributed research on topics in insurace mathematics and stability issues of modelling in financial mathematics.

Investigator in the Project Project "C5: Financial equilibria under Knightian uncertainty" within the Collaborative Research Center SFB 1283 (Taming uncertainty and profiting from randomness and low regularity in analysis, stochastics and their applications ), Bielefeld University, Germany. This collaborative research center has been funded by the German research Fundation (DFG) and it has a duration of 4 + 4 + 4 years (see https://www.sfb1283.uni-bielefeld.de/ for details).

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Research Fellowship of 3 years funding a Ph.D. position at the Center for Mathematics and Applications of the University of Oslo, Norway.

Research Fellowship of 1 month (March 2011) at J. Mack Robinson College of Business, Atlanta, USA. Title of the research theme: "Portfolio Optimization: Connecting Ambiguity Aversion and Regime Switching". Models.
Teaching at the Universities of Cologne, Munich and Bielefeld as in the attached file.

Research Fellowship of one month (March 2018) at the Department of Mathematoics of the University of Padova. This research fellowship has been funded by the Research Prize YITP (Young Investigator Training Program) awarded at the Conference Energy Finance Italia 2018 held in Pescara (Italy).
